short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically pause YouTube videos in new tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you tired of YouTube videos auto playing every time you open them in a new tab? Video Pause Control for YouTube is the solution you've been waiting for!

This Chrome extension allows you to take control of your YouTube experience by automatically pausing videos when they're opened in new tabs. No more surprise noise or distractions when you're multitasking. With a single click, you can enjoy a quieter, more focused browsing experience.
